item.description:
http://www.yallaboard.com/deals/57

Legendary Adventure Expo Party
Friday | March 18th | 6:00pm-11:00pm | Amesbury Sports Park

We have brought together champions of Adventure & Partying from communities like Social Boston Sports & Snowriders, to adventure powerhouses like Eastern Mountian Sports, Amesbury Sports Park, and Northern Outdoors thrown in free adventures from snowtubing, to off-road segway rides to playing with sled dogs, and added great eats, New England's finest drinks, beirut & cornhole games and live musical performances by Speed the Harvest and WXGR 101.5FM.

Oh, and SnowRiders is bringing their freestyle Ski & Snowboard Rail Jam Competition with a $500 prize...

Select an option above to get your:

1. Tickets for entry to the event $29 ($95 value) including free tubing, interactive adventure expo, and party.

2. Bus tickets for our legendary guests who need a ride from Boston to Amesbury Sports Park.


Here's a preview of your ridiculous night for a ridiculously low price of $29, save 70%!

2011 Adventure Expo Party

Sample Unique Adventures (Specific activities may vary at the mercy of Mother Nature)

* Snow tubing up to 45mph - by Amesbury Sports Park

* Freestyle Ski & Snowboard Rail Jam Competition with a $500 grand prize - by SnowRiders

* Extreme Challenge Course Race

* Intro to New England's best adventures:
o Ride off-road Segways,
o Play with husky sled dogs,
o Take a whitewater raft down the slope,
o Shoot at the paintball range,
o Hot Air Ballooning & Paragliding 101,
o Intro to snowshoeing and cross-country skiing and many more... By our amazing partner adventure companies including

Eastern Mounatin Sports Schools | Northern Outdoors |Muddy Paw Sled Dog Kennel | Parafly Paragliding | High 5 Ballooning

Party

* Beirut, Cornhole, & Games - by Social Boston Sports

* Live Music & Dancing - by Speed the Harvest

* Live DJ Broadcast - by WXGR 101.5F

* BBQ, Booze, Bonfire - by Amesbury Sports Park, Pabst Blue Ribbon, Cabin Fever Whiskey, Kennebec Brewery, Red Bull, and more...

Prizes and Giveaways
Chance to win trips, gear, and swag from New England's top adventure operators & outfitters.

Need a place to stay?

For our legendary guests from out of town, we have arranged a discount at a nearby hotel. Check out the Fairfield Inn by Marriott Amesbury and if you book by phone - (978) 388-3400 - say you are visiting the Adventure Expo & Party at Amesbury Sports Park with group code of "Adventure Expo"

Thanks again to our Sponsors:
Amesbury Sports Park
PBR
WXGR
Speed The Harvest
Social Boston Sports
EMS Schools
Northern Outdoors
SnowRiders
Touchstone Research
Cabin Fever Whiskey
item.why:
It's gonna be one giant party with so many different things to do. Definitely a great experience for those that like an adventure!
Plus, who wouldn't want to go snowtubing, ride a segway, learn about how to ride in a hot air balloon, etc?!
item.name: The 2011 Adventure Party hosted by YallAbroad
